targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  now() as 'time_sec',
  Count(id) as 'value'
FROM 
  voice_queues
WHERE
  TYPE='outbound' AND  (dialOriginateCallerIdNumber IS NULL OR dialOriginateCallerIdNumber = '')

SELECT id AS 'Identifier', name as 'Campaign' FROM voice_queues WHERE id NOT IN
	(
		SELECT 
			DISTINCT(voicequeueid) AS 'Campaign'
		FROM 
			cm_hopper
	)
AND TYPE='outbound';

SELECT 
	COUNT(a.voicequeueid) AS  total, b.name 
FROM 
	cm_hopper a,
	voice_queues b
WHERE 
	a.voicequeueid = b.id
	and recallme=1 AND userid IS NULL 
GROUP BY voicequeueid

select
  id,name
from
  voice_queues
where 
  type='outbound'
  and (dialOriginateCallerIdNumber is null or dialOriginateCallerIdNumber = '')

SELECT 
  id as 'Identifier', name as 'Campaign' 
FROM 
  voice_queues 
WHERE 
  id NOT IN
	(
		SELECT 
			DISTINCT(voicequeueid) AS 'Campaign'
		FROM 
			user_has_voice_queues
	)
AND TYPE='outbound';

SELECT 
  id as 'Identifier', name as 'Campaign' 
FROM 
  voice_queues 
WHERE 
  monitor_format = ''

SELECT NOW() AS 'time_sec', COUNT(id) AS 'value' FROM voice_queues WHERE id NOT IN
	(
		SELECT 
			DISTINCT(voicequeueid) AS 'Campaign'
		FROM 
			cm_hopper
	)
AND TYPE='outbound';

SELECT NOW() AS 'time_sec', COUNT(id) AS 'value' FROM voice_queues WHERE id NOT IN
	(
		SELECT 
			DISTINCT(voicequeueid) AS 'Campaign'
		FROM 
			user_has_voice_queues
	)
AND TYPE='outbound';

select 
  now() as 'time_sec',
  count(id) as 'value' 
from 
  voice_queues 
where 
  monitor_format='' and type='outbound'

SELECT
  now() as 'time_sec',
	count(id) as 'value'
FROM 
	cm_lists
WHERE id NOT IN
	(
		SELECT 
			DISTINCT(ListId)
		FROM 
			cm_hopper
	)

SELECT 
	id,name
FROM 
	cm_lists
WHERE id NOT IN
	(
		SELECT 
			DISTINCT(ListId)
		FROM 
			cm_hopper
	)

SELECT 
	id as 'Identifier',
	name as 'List'
FROM 
	cm_lists
WHERE id NOT IN
	(
		SELECT 
			DISTINCT(CmListId)
		FROM 
			cm_user_has_lists
	)

SELECT 
	NOW() AS 'time_sec',
	count(id) AS 'value' 
FROM 
	cm_lists
WHERE id NOT IN
	(
		SELECT 
			DISTINCT(CmListId)
		FROM 
			cm_user_has_lists
	)

SELECT 
	NOW() AS 'time_sec',
	count(id) AS 'value' 
FROM 
	users
WHERE id NOT IN
	(
		SELECT 
			DISTINCT(userid)
		FROM 
			user_has_voice_queues
	)
and role='agent'

SELECT 
	id,name
FROM 
	users
WHERE id NOT IN
	(
		SELECT 
			DISTINCT(userid)
		FROM 
			user_has_voice_queues
	)
and role='agent'

SELECT 
	id AS 'Identifier',
	name as 'Agent'
FROM 
	users
WHERE id NOT IN
	(
		SELECT 
			DISTINCT(UserId)
		FROM 
			cm_user_has_lists
	)
AND role='agent'

SELECT 
  id,
	name,
	fullname
FROM 
	users
WHERE 
loginInPause='0'
AND role='agent'

SELECT 
	NOW() AS 'time_sec',
	count(id) AS 'value' 
FROM 
	users
WHERE id NOT IN
	(
		SELECT 
			DISTINCT(UserId)
		FROM 
			cm_user_has_lists
	)
AND role='agent'

SELECT 
	NOW() AS 'time_sec',
	count(id) AS 'value' 
FROM 
	users
WHERE 
loginInPause='0'
AND role='agent'
